tool_description: AliExpress products and services as seen on Aliexpress.com. Begin by using our category endpoints to query a specific category niche and obtain the categoryID. With the categoryID in hand, you can then access the product endpoints to explore a vast collection of products within that category. Alternatively, harness the power of our search endpoints to refine your search and find exactly what you're looking for.
name: Aliexpress eCommerce
title: Aliexpress eCommerce

api_list.name: v1/product-details
api_list.description: Query AliExpress product details such as title, description, images, sales and more

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: Enter product_id (this data is in the /products endpoint)

api_list.name: v1/product-reviews
api_list.description: Query AliExpress product's review using the `productID`. The product ID can be found in the /products and /product-description endpoints

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: Enter the product description `productId` (this data is in the /product-details endpoint).

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Select the number of reviews per page (default: 20 & max: 100)

api_list.name: v1/categories
api_list.description: Get all the latest Aliexpress categories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aliexpress-ecommerce.p.rapidapi.com/v1/aliexpress/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aliexpress-ecommerce.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aliexpress-ecommerce.p.rapidapi.com/v1/aliexpress/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aliexpress-ecommerce.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: v1/products
api_list.description: Query AliExpress products for each category using the `categoryID`

api_list.name: v1/search
api_list.description: Search products on AliExpress.com using parameters to filter and sort your results
